description: This file defines a React component for a sidebar navigation menu, including a reusable NavItem component for navigation links with active state highlighting, and static links for project navigation and external documentation.

methods.name: NavItem
methods.description: A functional React component that renders a navigation link with visual indication of active state based on current pathname.

methods.name: Sidebar
methods.description: Main functional React component rendering the entire sidebar with navigation and external links.
